messages.content: This year's General Election is the most important in a generation – whether or not you and your family can look forward to a better, more secure future is at stake.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A clear economic plan to secure a better future which involves locking in recovery, growth, more jobs and better wages.
Putting in place the toughest welfare system for immigrants anywhere in Europe.
Renegotiating Britain’s relationship with Europe and delivering a referendum on Britain's EU membership.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Portsmouth South is one of just 23 seats that the Conservatives need to win to form a majority government.

issues.brexitEurope: Renegotiating Britain’s relationship with Europe, and a referendum on Britain's EU membership is at an in/out referendum.
issues.economy: A strong and healthy economy is the Conservatives' number one priority, involving recovery, growth, more jobs and better wages.
issues.immigration: Getting immigration under control and putting in place the toughest welfare system for immigrants anywhere in Europe.
issues.socialWelfare: Putting in place the toughest welfare system for immigrants anywhere in Europe.

housing.content: Building a system that rewards people who work hard, contribute and play by the rules.

contactInformation.address: Unit F4, Cumberland Business Centre, Northumberland Road, Portsmouth PO5 1DS
